Text: Multi subtitles.Enjoy the movie.A must download for Selena Gomez fans :)
Not in english...well in english but has another language speaking too loudly over english!
gbthecat download MKV merge. That'll let you remove the other audio files. You just add the mkv file, select only the video and english audio and hit start muxing
Also, if you play it with VLC it splits the audio into different channels so it'll play English as default.
